entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1000 metres rising to 1900 metres near noon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
